name: tree-view-sort
description: Add a sorting feature for the Atom tree-view package.

type.title: Sort By
type.description: The sorting type of the Atom tree-view package.

descending.title: Descending Sorting
descending.description: Use descending sorting, otherwise use ascending sorting. Unavailable when the tree-view-sort package is disabled.

caseSensitive.title: Case-Sensitive Sorting
caseSensitive.description: Use case-sensitive sorting, otherwise use case-insensitive sorting. Unavailable when the tree-view-sort package is disabled.

sortFoldersBeforeFiles.title: Sort Folders Before Files
sortFoldersBeforeFiles.description: When listing directory items, list subdirectories before listing files.
